biometric.permission: This app can recogonise the unique, three-dimensional features of your face to allow secure access to all your properties with Cenomi.

Your face is your password! 
Enable Face ID to login to Cenomi One app. It is fast and secure.

Your Touch ID/Face ID is your password! 
Enable Face ID/Touch ID to login to the Cenomi One app. It is fast and secure.

Once you set up Touch ID you can use it
to access your Cenomi One app.

wish.wishYourColleagueBirthday: Wish your colleague a happy birthday!
wish.wishYourColleagueAnniversary: Wish your colleague a happy anniversary!
wish.wishYourBirthdayTitle:
It's your birthday and all we want to
do is put a smile on your face!
wish.wishYourBirthdayDesc: “You deserve all the blessings coming your way because not only do you do outstanding work, but you are also an outstanding person.”
wish.anniversaryMessage:
year anniversary of service with Cenomi.

Thanks to you, Cenomi continues to be one of the most valued, admired & trusted companies in the region & the world. Your loyalty, professionalism and commitment have not only contributed to the success of the company, but also to the shaping of the landscape of KSA.

As you celebrate your service anniversary, please accept my sincere thanks. Your contribution to Cenomi's is what will make the company even greater in the years to come.”

- The Cenomi Team
